delete.question: Tem a certeza que pretende eliminar o(a) Dot {{ id }}?

help.timestamp: Moment at which the dot was captured
help.x: Position of dot in X axis
help.y: Position of dot in Y axis
help.tiltX: Tilt of the pen in X axis
help.tiltY: Tilt of the pen in Y axis
help.pressure: Pressure applied to the pen tip

samplingDot.created: Um novo Dot foi criado com o identificador {{ param }}
samplingDot.updated: Dot com identificador {{ param }} foi actualizado
samplingDot.deleted: Dot com identificador {{ param }} foi eliminado
